author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Camo unikitty
review:
Opening ;

Camo unikitty is a very fun surprisingly realistic looking military type figure from the summer 2018 unikitty blind bag series that coincided with the cartoon network series and other sets released.

The Minifigure-

The Minifigure has a very generic 1x3 pink printed brick for her head . And has the newer style connection to the torso which is a 1x3 blueish green arch brick with very nice camouflage prints and pouches , radios and straps . To the rear their is  a generic unikitty tail and perhaps the least interesting parts are the two dark bluish grey plates along with camouflage colours for the front legs . Above every thing else is the headband which has a great print that if you bought in bulk it would make a great camo pattern on military type mocs .

The stand -

The stand is the standard cloud unikitty stand .

In conclusion -

overall this is a good fit to get not the best but still a good one to get and we'll worth the price .

author: Odeinoichus
title: Military Might Wrapped in a Cute Package.
review:
Set #41775 Camouflage Unikitty: Ready to infiltrate Lord Business' evil lair... or you know, maybe just out for some fun. Camouflage Unikitty includes some highly impressive camo printing on her 1x3 bridge torso element. I wonder if anybody has bought these things and used the parts in weird or fun ways yet? I'll have to look that up.

Her tail remains unaltered, but she has a printed headband plate on the top of her head and a cute looking design. Definitely another solid Variant from LEGO for this character. Tough to get unless you purchase on the secondary market and don't try the blind bag purchase approach. But overall, I'd recommend her. Recommended.
